Package com.example.fairdraw.Others

Class OrganizerEventsDataHolder

java.lang.Object
com.example.fairdraw.Others.OrganizerEventsDataHolder
public final class OrganizerEventsDataHolder extends Object
A singleton class that holds the event data for the organizer.

  • Method Details

    • getEvents

      public static List<Event> getEvents()
      Get the list of events.
      Returns:
      A copy of the list of events.

    • getDataList

      public static ArrayList<Event> getDataList()
      Backwards-compatible: original code expects an ArrayList (getDataList()). Return the internal list reference as an ArrayList for existing callers that rely on direct modification. NOTE: callers who modify the returned list should be careful; prefer getEvents() for a safe copy.

    • setDataList

      public static void setDataList(ArrayList<Event> dataList)
      Backwards-compatible setter used by OrganizerMainPage to set the data list reference. We'll copy elements into our internal synchronized list to preserve thread-safety.

    • setAdapter

      public static void setAdapter(EventArrayAdapter a)
      Set the event adapter for the app.
      Parameters:
      a - This is the adapter that will be used to display the events in the app.

    • setEventAdapter

      public static void setEventAdapter(EventArrayAdapter a)
      Backwards-compatible name used in codebase: setEventAdapter

    • addEvent

      public static void addEvent(Event event)
      Add an event to the data list.
      Parameters:
      event - The new event that needs to be added

    • updateEvent

      public static void updateEvent(Event event, int index)
      Update an existing event at the provided index. Backwards-compatible with existing callers.

    • clear

      public static void clear()
      Clear all events from the data list.
